CustomField.description: User entered Discretionary Uplift. In UI user can enter either a currency amount or a percentage. If a currency amount is entered, value is converted to a percentage before storing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Technically this is the "Annual Total (not Unit) Uplift", but a percentage is the same whether it is monthly, annual, or one-time (i.e. for perpetual products)
CustomField.label: Annual Total Uplift Percentage
